description:
Our client is seeking a skilled and enthusiastic Web Developer with knowledge of web development to join their team. In this role, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining our e-commerce stores, with a specific focus on the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform. While prior experience with Shopify and bigcommerce is not required, the ideal candidate should have a solid understanding of web development basics and a willingness to learn and excel.

 

Location - Maitrinagar


Working hour - 9am -6pm


Lunch provided

Good holidays
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Web Development, or a related field (or equivalent work experience)
  • Minimum of 2 years of professional web development experience
  • Solid understanding of web development fundamentals, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript and responsive design principles
  • Familiarity with Shopify is preferred, but not required. Willingness to learn and master the Shopify platform is essential
  • Experience in building and customizing websites using content management systems (CMS)
  • Strong problem-solving and troubleshooting skills, with the ability to identify and resolve technical issues efficiently
  • Knowledge of web analytics tools, such as Google Analytics, to track website performance and user behavior
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and agile development methodologies
  • Strong attention to detail and the ability to work on multiple projects simultaneously while meeting deadlines
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively in a team environment

 

This is a full-time position located at our office, where you will receive training and guidance on using Shopify & Bigcommerce effectively. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, as well as opportunities for professional growth and advancement in a fast-paced and innovative environment.

If you are a motivated web developer with a strong foundation in web development and a passion for e-commerce, we encourage you to apply. Join our team and expand your skills by learning and leveraging the Shopify & Bigcommerce platform to create exceptional online experiences for our customers.


Note: Candidates with experience in any Frontend or Backend, programming languages such as PHP, JavaScript, HTML CSS, or others can apply.
responsibilities:
• Develop and maintain e-commerce websites, with a primary focus on the Shopify platform, ensuring high-quality and visually appealing user interfaces
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including designers, marketers, and project managers, to implement website changes, updates, and new features
  • Customize and configure Shopify & Bigcommerce themes, templates, and plugins to meet specific project requirements and business needs
  • Ensure websites are optimized for performance, responsiveness, and SEO best practices
  • Troubleshoot and resolve any front-end and back-end issues that arise, including compatibility and functionality problems
  • Perform regular website maintenance tasks, such as monitoring site performance, managing content updates, and resolving technical glitches or bugs
  • Stay up-to-date with industry trends, best practices, and new technologies related to web development, PHP, and e-commerce
  • Collaborate with the team to brainstorm and propose innovative ideas to improve user experience, conversion rates, and overall website performance
  • Provide technical guidance and support to junior developers or team members as needed
  • Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance to ensure the website's functionality and compatibility across different browsers and devices

description:
As an Associate, you will play a crucial role in supporting the overall operations of the company. You will work closely with the Manager and other team members to ensure the seamless execution of projects. This role requires a combination of organizational skills, communication abilities, and a proactive mindset to navigate the complexities of international product sourcing.


 

The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.


 Location: Balwatar, Kathmandu

Working hours: 9am - 5pm
requirements:
• Bachelor's degree in Business, Supply Chain Management, or a related field.
  • Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, in English.
  • Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite and other relevant software tools.
  • Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities.
  • Knowledge of international trade regulations and logistics is a plus
responsibilities:
1. Executive Support:

● Manage the CEO's schedule, including meetings, appointments, and travel arrangements.

● Prepare and review documents, reports, and presentations for the CEO.

● Handle confidential information with discretion and professionalism.

● Serve as the point of contact between the CEO and internal/external stakeholders.


2. Communication Management:

● Draft and manage correspondence on behalf of the CEO.

● Facilitate effective communication within the organization and with external partners.

● Coordinate and prepare for executive meetings, including taking minutes and following up on action items.


3. Strategic Assistance:

● Assist in the development and implementation of strategic

initiatives.

● Conduct research and provide insights on market trends,

competitors, and potential business opportunities.

● Help in the preparation and analysis

Project Management:

● Oversee and manage special projects as directed by the CEO.

● Ensure projects are on track, deadlines are met, and objectives are achieved.

● Coordinate with different departments to gather necessary information and resources for projects.


4. Operational Support:

● Improve operational processes and procedures to enhance efficiency and productivity.

● Assist in budgeting, financial reporting, and resource allocation.

● Monitor key performance indicators (KPIs) and provide regular updates to the CEO.


5. Relationship Management:

● Build and maintain relationships with key clients, suppliers, and business partners.

● Represent the CEO in meetings and events when necessary.

● Facilitate networking opportunities for the CEO and the organization.


6. Problem Solving:

● Identify issues and challenges within the organization and propose solutions.

● Act as a sounding board for the CEO on various business matters.

● Address and resolve any administrative or operational problems promptly.


7. Confidentiality and Discretion:

  • Maintain the highest level of confidentiality and integrity in handling sensitive company information.
  • Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures, as well as relevant legal regulations.
  • By efficiently managing these responsibilities, an assistant to the CEO can significantly contribute to the company's success, particularly in a dynamic and fast-paced industry like sourcing and procurement.


8. Documentation and Record Keeping

• Manage and organize sourcing-related documents, including contracts, invoices, and product specifications.

• Maintain accurate and up-to-date records of supplier information, negotiations, and agreements.


9. Quality Control

• Collaborate with the Quality Control team to ensure that products meet specified quality standards.

• Monitor and report on production progress and address any quality concerns promptly.


10. Logistics Coordination

  • Work with logistics partners to coordinate shipping schedules and track the movement of goods.
  • Assist in resolving any shipping or customs-related issues to ensure timely delivery.


11. Client Support

• Provide support to clients by addressing inquiries, providing updates, and ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.

• Collaborate with the Sales team to understand client requirements and communicate effectively with all stakeholders.

  7. Education: A degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, User Experience Design, or a related field is preferred, though substantial professional experience can substitute for formal education.

We are looking for a candidate who not only meets these technical and professional standards but also fits well within our dynamic, collaborative culture.
responsibilities:

  6. Apply Product and Color Theory: Integrate principles of product and color theory to improve interface design and usability.

jobTitle: Night Shift Experience Sales and Support Staff
description:
We are currently seeking experienced and dedicated Night Shift Sales and Support Staff to join our team. As a member of our night shift team, you will play a crucial role in providing exceptional sales assistance and customer support during non-traditional hours. This position requires individuals with a strong background in sales, customer service, and technical skills, as well as the ability to work independently during the night shift.
Work Day: Monday to Saturday
Work Time : 10 PM  to 6 AM
requirements:
• Minimum of 3 years of experience in sales, customer service, or a related field, preferably in a night shift environment.
  • Ability to work independently and efficiently during non-traditional hours (10 PM to 6 AM).
  • Strong computer skills with proficiency in using CRM systems and other sales software tools.
  • Basic technical knowledge to troubleshoot and assist customers with technical issues related to our products or services.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a customer-focused mindset and the ability to build rapport with customers over the phone, email, or chat.
  • Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to handle challenging situations calmly and professionally.
  • Detail-oriented with the ability to multitask and prioritize tasks effectively in a fast-paced environment.
  • Flexibility to adapt to changing business needs and schedules, including occasional overtime or weekend shifts as required.
responsibilities:
• Handle inbound and outbound sales inquiries and customer support requests during the night shift hours (10 PM to 6 AM).
  • Assist customers in navigating through our products or services, providing information, and addressing any questions or concerns they may have.
  • Utilize our CRM system to manage customer interactions, update customer records, and track sales activities accurately.
  • Proactively identify sales opportunities and promote products or services to meet customers' needs and exceed sales targets.
  • Resolve customer issues and complaints promptly and professionally, ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction and retention.
  • Collaborate closely with other team members and departments to escalate complex issues and provide timely resolutions.
  • Stay updated on product knowledge, sales techniques, and company policies to effectively communicate with customers and drive sales performance.
  • Maintain detailed records of sales interactions and customer inquiries for reporting and analysis purposes.

description: Our client is a reputable company seeking Customer Support Representative to join their team. As a Customer Support Representative specializing in Chat, Email, and Ticket Support, you will play a crucial role in ensuring the satisfaction and positive experience of our customers. This is a remote position, offering a full-time opportunity to engage with customers through various channels, addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and providing exceptional service. The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.
requirements:
• Previous experience in customer support or a related role.
  • Strong written communication skills with an emphasis on clarity and professionalism.
  • Ability to navigate multiple software tools simultaneously.
  • Problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically under pressure.
  • Excellent time management and organizational skills.
  • Familiarity with customer support ticketing systems and chat platforms.

Requirements:

  • High-speed internet connection for uninterrupted remote work.
  • Quiet and dedicated workspace to facilitate productive communication.
  • Flexibility to work shifts that may include evenings, weekends, or holidays.

Benefits:

  • Competitive salary with performance-based incentives.
  • Opportunities for professional development and career advancement.
  • Supportive and collaborative remote work culture.

If you are a motivated and customer-focused individual with the skills to excel in a remote customer support role, we encourage you to apply and join our dynamic team dedicated to providing outstanding service.
responsibilities:
1. Chat Support:

    • Engage with customers through live chat, providing real-time assistance and solutions.
    • Maintain a professional and friendly demeanor in written communication.
    • Multi-task effectively to handle multiple chat conversations simultaneously.

  2. Email Support:

    • Respond to customer emails promptly and professionally.
    • Thoroughly understand customer concerns and provide accurate and helpful information.
    • Escalate complex issues to the appropriate teams for resolution.

  3. Ticket Support:

    • Manage customer support tickets, ensuring timely and efficient resolution.
    • Prioritize and categorize tickets based on urgency and nature of the issue.
    • Collaborate with internal teams to address and resolve escalated tickets.

  4. Customer Interaction:

    • Build rapport and establish positive relationships with customers.
    • Proactively identify and address potential issues to prevent escalations.
    • Gather customer feedback and communicate insights to improve processes.

  5. Remote Work:

    • Demonstrate self-motivation and accountability while working remotely.
    • Ensure a stable and secure work environment conducive to effective communication.

description:
We are currently seeking talented individuals for a vacancy within a leading Korean company. The company started with a drone mapping project to help Nepal recover from the disastrous earthquake back in 2015. Through this project, we realized the possibility of creating new value by combining drone and photogrammetry technology, and we are convinced that technology could bring positive change to society.

The recruitment process is managed by the TalentSathi team (Sister Venture of InternSathi for recruitment), ensuring a thorough and fair selection process.
requirements:
## Minimum Qualifications

– Minimum 1.5-2+ years of experience in relevant tech stack (ReactJS)
– Minimum 1+ years of experience developing ReactJS applications using TypeScript
– Strong knowledge and skills in the following technologies:
– Languages: JavaScript and TypeScript
– Framework: ReactJS
– Libraries: Redux, RxJS
– Web Technologies: HTML5, CSS, SCSS
– Experience writing tests and Continuous Integration
– Ability to build and maintain positive working relationships with stakeholders of various levels
– Excellent attention to detail and willingness to learn new software/processes
– Obsessed with pixel-perfecting UI/UX
– Able to use initiative and remain self-motivated
– Able to work calmly and effectively under pressure
– Maintaining confidentiality/discretion where required
– Open to taking on new challenges
– Proficient in communication in English (both written and verbal)
– Excellent communication skills for inter-team collaborations including engineers and designers
– Able to write technical and non-technical documentation to create and maintain Knowledge Base

## Preferred Qualifications

– Knowledge and experience implementing Atomic Design Pattern
– Knowledge and understanding of AWS Services
– Knowledge and experience with GIS Technologies
– Experience working with libraries such as Cesium, OpenLayers, WebGL (3D Rendering), Three.js
– Proactive and able to be self-managed

 

5 days working days (Monday - Friday)
      - Working time can be chosen from 7 -9 am (Starting time)  to 4 - 6 pm (ending time) NPT
      - Total 9 hours with an hour of lunch break
responsibilities:
– Writing code that is fit for purpose, is scalable, human-readable, and in line with industry best practice
– Quality control and assurance of the entire product lifecycle by testing various components such as functionality, UI/UX, and debugging where necessary
– Communicating with the product owner and lead to understanding their business goals and objectives, and interpreting that into the required changes to the platform where necessary
– Collaborating with other developers, teams, designers, and product manager to identify new features and create relevant prototypes for new product ideas
– Studying the problem statements and proposing solutions to decision-makers
– Working on full production cycles from brainstorming and rapid prototyping to developing fully-fledged systems and fine-tuning mechanics, as well as stress testing and bug fixing.
– Solving technical problems with simple, efficient, and effective code
– Writing technical and non-technical documentation
– Participate/Contribute in code peer review
– Performance evaluation of juniors/interns

description: As a Marketing Manager at our digital agency, you will be the superhero behind promoting our services and making sure the world knows about the awesome things we do. You'll be the captain of the marketing ship, steering our brand to success in the digital seas.
requirements:
1. Experience Explorer: 1+ years in marketing, especially in the digital realm. We need someone who's been around the block and knows the ins and outs of the digital landscape.

  2. Strategic Sage: A strategic mindset with a proven track record of creating and implementing successful marketing strategies. You've got the vision to see the big picture and the skills to make it happen.

  3. Communication Champ: Excellent communication skills – both written and spoken. You can craft compelling messages and inspire others to get on board.

  4. Team Whisperer: Experience in leading and managing a marketing team. You know how to bring out the best in people and foster a collaborative, creative environment.

  5. Data Dexterity: Proficiency in using analytics tools. You're not afraid of numbers; in fact, you love them and can turn data into actionable insights.

  6. Tech Savvy: Familiarity with the latest digital marketing tools and trends. You're not intimidated by technology – you embrace it and use it to your advantage.
responsibilities:
1. Strategy Guru: Develop and execute mind-blowing marketing strategies. Think of yourself as the architect of our success – plan, implement, and tweak strategies to ensure we stand out in the digital world.

  2. Content Commander: Oversee the creation of captivating content. From social media posts to blog articles, you'll be the chief storyteller, making sure our message is clear, compelling, and hard to ignore.

  3. Team Maestro: Lead a team of marketing enthusiasts. Your role is like conducting a symphony – everyone has their part, and you make sure the melody is harmonious. Provide guidance, support, and maybe a bit of cheerleading.

  4. Data Detective: Dive into analytics to uncover hidden insights. Numbers are your sidekick – use them to track the success of our campaigns, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.

  5. Tech Trailblazer: Stay on top of digital marketing trends and tools. You're the trailblazer, testing out new tech and strategies to keep us ahead of the curve.

  6. Brand Guardian: Protect and enhance our brand. You're the gatekeeper, ensuring consistency in our messaging and visuals across all platforms.

description: As a videographer in a digital agency, your main job is to create awesome videos that help our clients showcase their products, services, or ideas. You'll be responsible for planning, shooting, and editing videos that tell a compelling story and grab people's attention online.
requirements:
1. Experience: Proven experience as a videographer with a strong portfolio showcasing your work.
  2. Technical Skills: Proficient in video editing software and familiar with various camera equipment.
  3. Creativity: A creative mindset with the ability to turn ideas into visually appealing content.
  4. Communication: Strong communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively with team members.
  5. Adaptability: Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and adapt to changing priorities.
responsibilities:
1. Planning: Collaborate with clients and our team to understand their goals and message. Plan the shots, scenes, and overall flow of the video.

  2. Shooting: Use your camera skills to capture high-quality footage. This may involve setting up equipment, choosing the right angles, and working with lighting.

  3. Editing: Bring the footage to life in the editing room. Cut and arrange clips, add music, graphics, and effects to create a polished final product.

  4. Creativity: Bring fresh ideas to the table. Be innovative in how you tell a story visually and keep up with the latest trends in video production.

  5. Communication: Work closely with clients and the rest of the digital agency team to ensure everyone is on the same page and the final product meets expectations.

  6. Technical Skills: Stay on top of the latest video production technologies and techniques. This includes familiarity with various cameras, editing software, and other tools.

  7. Deadline Management: Deliver projects on time and within budget. Juggle multiple projects if needed.

description: As a Video Editor at our digital agency, you'll be the person who makes videos look awesome! Your job is to take raw video footage and turn it into cool, eye-catching content that our clients will love. We want someone who's good at using video editing software and has a creative touch.
requirements:
• You've edited videos before and can show us your work.
  • You know how to use video editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro.
  • You understand how videos are made and what makes them look good.
  • It's a bonus if you know about things like motion graphics and animation.
  • You can work on multiple projects and meet deadlines.
  • You have good ideas and can communicate well with others.
  • You need to have a good attitude.
responsibilities:
1. Edit Videos:

    • Take raw video clips and make them look polished and cool.
    • Add things like graphics and special effects to make the videos interesting.

  2. Work with Others:

    • Talk to our creative team and clients to understand what they want in the videos.
    • Come up with ideas and plans for making the videos great.

  3. Check Quality:

    • Make sure the videos look and sound good by adjusting things like colors and sound levels.
    • Check that the videos meet our standards.

  4. Keep Up with Trends:

    • Stay updated on what's new and cool in the video world.
    • Learn new skills and bring fresh ideas to the team.

  5. Manage Files:

    • Keep all our digital files organized so we can find them easily.
    • Work with the team to make sure our media library is neat and tidy.

  6. Talk to Clients:

    • Show drafts of the videos to clients and make changes based on what they want.
    • Talk to clients to understand what they're looking for in the videos.

As a UI/UX Designer, you will play a critical role in shaping the user experience and interface design of our digital products and platforms. Leveraging your expertise in user-centered design principles and innovative design solutions, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to create intuitive and visually compelling experiences that delight our users and drive engagement.

Key Responsibilities:

User Research and Analysis:

  • Conduct user research, including interviews, surveys, and usability testing, to gain insights into user behaviors, needs, and preferences,
  • Analyze user feedback, market trends, and competitor products to identify opportunities for improvement and innovation in user experience design,
  • Develop user personas, journey maps, and user flows to inform the design process and ensure alignment with user goals and objectives.


Wireframing and Prototyping:

  • Create wireframes, prototypes, and interactive mockups to visualize design concepts and user interactions across different digital platforms and devices,
  • Iterate on design solutions based on feedback and testing results, refining and optimizing the user experience to enhance usability and accessibility,
  • Collaborate with stakeholders and development teams to validate design concepts and ensure feasibility and scalability of proposed solutions.


Interface Design and Visual Styling:

  • Design visually appealing user interfaces that adhere to brand guidelines and design standards while maintaining consistency and coherence across all digital touchpoints,
  • Develop UI components, icons, and visual assets that enhance the usability and aesthetic appeal of digital products, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience,
  • Incorporate principles of typography, color theory, and layout composition to create intuitive and user-friendly interfaces that facilitate efficient navigation and information retrieval.


Interaction Design and Animation:

  • Define and design interactive elements, transitions, and animations that enhance user engagement and provide feedback to user actions,
  • Implement micro interactions and subtle animations to guide users through the user interface, communicate system status, and create moments of delight,
  • Collaborate with front-end developers and motion designers to implement interactive prototypes and ensure fidelity and consistency in design execution.


Usability Testing and Iteration:

  • Conduct usability testing sessions to evaluate the effectiveness and usability of design solutions, gathering feedback and insights to inform iterative design improvements,
  • Analyze usability testing data and metrics to identify pain points, usability issues, and areas for optimization in the user interface and interaction design,
  • Iterate on design solutions based on usability testing findings, refining and iterating until optimal user experience outcomes are achieved.


Cross-Functional Collaboration:

  • Collaborate closely with product managers, developers, and other stakeholders throughout the design process, from concept ideation to final implementation,
  • Communicate design concepts, rationale, and decisions effectively to cross-functional teams and stakeholders, soliciting feedback and fostering a collaborative design culture,
  • Work in agile development environments, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and design reviews to ensure alignment with project goals and timelines.


Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Graphic Design, Interaction Design, Human-Computer Interaction, or a related field,
  • 3+ years of professional experience in UI/UX design, with a strong portfolio showcasing your design process and outcomes,
  • Proficiency in design and prototyping tools such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, or InVision,
  • Solid understanding of user-centered design principles, usability best practices, and design thinking methodologies,
  • Experience with user research methods, including usability testing, user interviews, and persona development,
  • Strong visual design skills with a keen eye for detail, typography, color, and layout,
  • Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to articulate design concepts and rationale to diverse audiences.

As a Branding and Marketing Executive, you will play a key role in developing and implementing strategies to build and promote our brand identity, increase brand awareness, and drive customer engagement. Leveraging your expertise in branding, marketing, and communication, you will collaborate closely with cross-functional teams to execute integrated marketing campaigns and initiatives that effectively communicate our brand message and value proposition.

Key Responsibilities:

Brand Strategy and Development:

  • Develop and execute comprehensive brand strategies that align with company objectives and resonate with target audiences,
  • Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify brand positioning opportunities and differentiation strategies,
  • Define brand attributes, messaging, and visual identity elements, ensuring consistency across all marketing channels and touchpoints.


Brand Communication:

  • Craft compelling brand stories and narratives that communicate our unique value proposition and resonate with our target audience,
  • Develop and implement brand communication plans across various channels, including digital, social media, print, and events,
  • Collaborate with creative teams to produce marketing collateral, advertising materials, and content that effectively convey our brand message and identity.


Marketing Campaigns and Promotions:

  • Plan, execute, and optimize integrated marketing campaigns and promotions to drive brand awareness, engagement, and customer acquisition,
  • Develop creative campaign concepts, messaging, and visual assets that capture attention and drive action,
  • Monitor campaign performance metrics and KPIs, analyzing data to identify trends, insights, and areas for improvement.


Digital Marketing and Social Media:

  • Manage and optimize digital marketing channels, including websites, email marketing, SEO, SEM, and social media platforms,
  • Develop content calendars, post schedules, and engagement strategies to drive audience growth, engagement, and conversion,
  • Monitor social media channels and online conversations, responding to inquiries, comments, and feedback in a timely and professional manner.


Brand Partnerships and Sponsorships:

  • Identify strategic brand partnership opportunities and sponsorship programs that align with our brand values and target audience interests,
  • Negotiate and manage partnerships, collaborations, and sponsorships with relevant brands, organizations, and influencers,
  • Measure and evaluate the effectiveness of brand partnerships and sponsorships, tracking ROI and impact on brand awareness and perception.


Brand Monitoring and Reputation Management:

  • Monitor brand mentions, sentiment, and online reviews across various platforms, proactively addressing any issues or concerns,
  • Implement reputation management strategies to maintain and enhance our brand image and credibility,
  • Engage with customers and stakeholders to build positive relationships and foster brand advocacy.


Qualifications:

  • 3+ years of professional experience in branding, marketing, or advertising, preferably in a similar industry or role,
  • Strong understanding of branding principles, marketing strategies, and consumer behavior,
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to articulate brand messages effectively,
  • Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a passion for storytelling and brand building,
  • Proficiency in digital marketing tools and platforms, including social media management, email marketing, and analytics,
  • Ability to work collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, managing multiple projects and priorities effectively.

As a DevOps Engineer, you will play a crucial role in optimizing software development processes, automating deployment pipelines, and enhancing the reliability and scalability of our infrastructure. Leveraging your expertise in development, operations, and automation tools, you will collaborate closely with development teams to streamline the delivery of high-quality software solutions and ensure continuous integration and deployment practices.

Key Responsibilities:

Infrastructure Automation:

  • Design, build, and maintain scalable and resilient infrastructure using infrastructure-as-code (IaC) tools such as Terraform, CloudFormation, or Ansible,
  • Implement automation scripts and configuration management tools to provision, configure, and manage cloud resources and virtualized environments,
  • Orchestrate containerized applications using containerization platforms like Docker and container orchestration tools like Kubernetes.


Continuous Integration and Deployment (CI/CD):

  • Implement and maintain CI/CD pipelines for automating the build, test, and deployment processes of software applications,
  • Integrate version control systems, build servers, testing frameworks, and deployment tools to enable seamless code integration and delivery,
  • Monitor CI/CD pipelines, identify bottlenecks, and optimize workflows to improve efficiency and reliability.


Monitoring and Performance Optimization:

  • Implement monitoring and logging solutions to track the health, performance, and availability of applications and infrastructure components,
  • Set up alerts and notifications to proactively identify and address performance issues, security vulnerabilities, and system failures,
  • Conduct performance tuning and optimization activities to improve the scalability, responsiveness, and cost-effectiveness of infrastructure resources.


Security and Compliance:

  • Implement security best practices and compliance standards to protect sensitive data and ensure regulatory compliance,
  • Harden infrastructure configurations, enforce access controls, and implement security controls to mitigate risks and vulnerabilities,
  • Perform regular security audits, vulnerability assessments, and penetration tests to identify and remediate security weaknesses.
     

Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing:

  • Collaborate with development teams, system administrators, and other stakeholders to align DevOps practices with business goals and objectives,
  • Provide technical guidance, mentorship, and training to team members on DevOps tools, practices, and methodologies,
  • Foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within the organization, promoting DevOps principles and best practices.


Incident Response and Disaster Recovery:

  • Develop and maintain incident response plans and disaster recovery procedures to ensure business continuity in the event of system outages or security breaches,
  • Participate in incident response activities, including incident detection, investigation, and resolution, to minimize the impact on operations and customer experience,
  • Conduct post-incident reviews and root cause analyses to identify underlying issues and implement preventive measures.
     

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field,
  • 3+ years of professional experience in DevOps, software development, or system administration,
  • Proficiency in scripting languages such as Python, Bash, or PowerShell,
  • Experience with cloud computing platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud) and related services,
  • Strong understanding of CI/CD principles, tools, and practices (e.g., Jenkins, GitLab CI/CD),
  • Familiarity with containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes) and orchestration tools,
  • Excellent problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
